name: Delayed Destruction
description:
The local authorities have decided to demolish your house to build a freeway. The bulldozer is just up the street, but you’re prepared. Take the steel girders you’ve gathered and keep that bulldozer out of your living room for as long as possible!

Browser playable,

This game was made in 10 hours. All graphics, code, music, and sound effects were created on 2022.04.03.
